channel.title: Valleywag on Argolon Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Valleywag on Argolon Solutions

item.title: Feedburner not buying Nooked
item.description: Well as ever it looks like Valleywag is about as accurate as the National Enquirer and I shouldn’t be spreading their rubbish rumours. Fergus has stated that the story is untrue. It was just one of those stories that grows because it makes perfect sense even if it is not true. Not that I’d ever believe a word on Valleywag but they are reporting that Feedburner has bought Nooked. If it’s true then huge congrats to Fergus and the team, it is much deserved.
